Fun game with friends because there's a high chance to encounter a hacker that ruins all the fun.

EÄŸer survivor olarak oynuyorsanÄ±z takÄ±m arkadaÅŸÄ±nÄ±zÄ±n iyi oynamasÄ± en az sizin iyi oynamanÄ±z kadar Ã¶nem taÅŸÄ±yor. Random gelen takÄ±m arkadaÅŸÄ±nÄ±z sadece kendi kÄ±Ã§Ä±nÄ± kurtarma derdinde olunca oyundan aldÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ±z zevk de dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼yor. Bu yÃ¼zden oyunu oynayacak Ã§evreniz varsa dÃ¶rtleyip oynamanÄ±zÄ± tavsiye ederim.

When you first play this game, you are scared and hide in the corners of the map, then you will think every killer has "wallhack" just because they found you when you thought you were well "hidden", then you will sprint away from the killer and wonder why they can allways find you no matter what (obviously "wallhack"), then you will get 1 shot at the endgame phase and wonder why you got insta down... at the end of the day this will transform a suppose "horror game" into a rage inducing experience, where no matter how you die you either got "camped", "tunneled", "baited", "lagged", "farmed", and the list goes on... I suggest not learning the basics of the game at first, because when you know nothing about what you are doing its when it gets fun and scary, and if you want to do the opposite and learn every aspect of this game as fast as possible, just go to youtube and search for a person called "Otz.." or something like that, or you can simply play killer.

Es un buen multijugador, te podes llegar a encontrar algÃºn campero y tunnelero por lo general en rangos bajos pero tambiÃ©n los hay en rangos altos. Lo que mas vas a encontrar en este juego son golpes falsos y algÃºn que otro bug cuando aÃ±aden algo nuevo. Quitando todo eso es un grandioso juego.
A lot of fun to play, biggest issue for me is the bloodpoint grind takes forever
As a novice, I'm definitely learning a lot and it's the right mix of challenging and spooky! :3 Really fun all around, especially when playing with friends! :D

Great game especially if you play with your friends while a on discord call with them, survivor gets a bit repetitive after awhile if you face the same killer over and over again but overall its a good game and if you are looking for a fun "horror" game where you can pick who and what side you are on, this is a great choice.

Love this game. I love this game so much. But in it's state, I would not recommend picking up until they fix the basic gameplay functions that just don't work. Like perks not activating, and pallets not dropping... and getting stuck in lockers, unable to exit them.
